items.headline: Kroger’s stock surges as the grocer finally names a new CEO
items.summary_en: Kroger’s stock rallies after the grocer named Greg Foran, the former leader of Walmart U.S. as its new CEO after a nearly yearlong search.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Gold futures once again reclaim $5,000 mark
items.summary_en: Gold futures rose on Monday, as the volatile yellow metal benefited from uncertainty overseas.

items.headline: Hims & Hers reverses plan for oral Wegovy, and its stock tumbled 20%
items.summary_en: Hims & Hers stock tumbled in early action on Monday after the U.S. company quickly reversed plans to introduce its own version of Novo Nordisk’s Wegovy oral weight-loss drug.

items.headline: STMicro shares boom on multiyear, multibillion-dollar deal with Amazon Web Services
items.summary_en: In the partnership announced, Amazon Web Services will receive a long-term supply of advanced semiconductor chips and in return may acquire a stake of up to 2.7% in STMicro.

items.headline: The labor market was bad last year. Will investors get stung by a poor January jobs report, too?
items.summary_en: Investors are on edge about the January jobs report after an anxious week on Wall Street — but the survey is likely to tell them more about the past than the future of a fragile U.S. labor market.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I settled my father’s estate, but found a will deeding a mobile home to his stepson. Am I ethically and legally obliged to fix this?

items.headline: Bank of America flags a really big risk to bonds — the stock market

items.headline: Why Kyndryl’s stock is sinking after earnings
items.summary_en: Shares could lose more than a third of their value Monday following the disclosure of an accounting investigation and a big reset of the company’s financial guidance.
